      • setRelativePose

        public void setRelativePose()
        Description copied from interface: LightningDrivetrain
        Zeros the pose returned bu LightningDrivetrain.getRelativePose() to be relative to zero. Useful for using robot-relative trajectories while still keping track of field pose.
        Specified by:
        setRelativePose in interface LightningDrivetrain
